The tech industry responds: “We are hopeful,” Dean Garfield, president of the Information Technology Industry Council, told MT, adding the two sides should address “persistent issues regarding data transfer, cloud services restrictions and discriminatory regulations and standards in order to level the playing field.”

Europe’s final countdown to GDPR
